name: UIFocusMovementHint
desc: Provides movement hint information for the focused item.

items.name: var movementDirection: CGVector
items.desc: A vector representing how close focus is to moving to another item in the swiped direction.

items.name: var interactionTransform: CATransform3D
items.desc: A 3D transform that contains the combined transformations of perspective, rotation, and translation.

items.name: var perspectiveTransform: CATransform3D
items.desc: A 3D transform that represents a perspective matrix to be applied to match UIKit interaction hinting.

items.name: var rotation: CGVector
items.desc: A vector to apply to a transform to match system interaction hinting.

items.name: var translation: CGVector
items.desc: A vector to apply to a transform to match system interaction hinting.
